sentences.en: an advertising campaign intended to reinforce our corporate identity
sentences.cn: 旨在加强我们公司形象的广告宣传活动

sentences.en: changing the corporate culture (= the way that people in a corporation think and behave ) to accept family-friendly policies
sentences.cn: 改变公司文化，采取更关怀家庭的政策

sentences.en: Coincident interests with the corporate rich and political directorate are pointed out.
sentences.cn: 有人指出这合乎的是公司富豪和政治官员的利益。

sentences.en: Corporate America is not about to be converted to the environmentalist cause.
sentences.cn: 美国企业界不打算投身环保事业。

sentences.en: Corporate backbiting is nothing new.
sentences.cn: 在公司里，背后说人坏话并非什么新鲜事。

sentences.en: Corporate crime — committed by businesses — should not be confused with white - collar crime, which refers to the occupation of the perpetrator and may be directed against a business.
sentences.cn: 公司犯罪不应与 白领 犯罪混淆, 后者指的是犯罪者的职业,其罪行可能是针对企业的.

sentences.en: corporate responsibility
sentences.cn: 共同的责任

sentences.en: His corporate's life will be as short as a rabbit's tail.
sentences.cn: 他的公司的寿命是兔子尾巴长不了.

sentences.en: If they are wrong, both of them will end up in the corporate slow lane.
sentences.cn: 要是他们错了，那么他俩都会沦为公司里的落后分子。

sentences.en: In 2006,corporate savings may have approached 25% of GDP.
sentences.cn: 2006年，企业的存款可能已经达到了GDP的25%。

sentences.en: Increasingly, corporate clients are seeking to outsource the management of their facilities.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的公司客户寻求将设施的管理外包出去。

sentences.en: Our newspaper and our printing business form separate corporate entities.
sentences.cn: 我们的报纸和印刷业形成相对独立的企业实体.

sentences.en: Persons liable can include officers and employees of corporate generators and transporters.
sentences.cn: 应该负责的人也包括产出者与运输者法人组织的官员和雇员.

sentences.en: The company is moving its corporate headquarters (= main offices ) from New York to Houston.
sentences.cn: 这家公司要把总部从纽约迁到休斯敦。

sentences.en: The corporate giants try to drive down wages in order to make superprofits.
sentences.cn: 公司巨头们企图压低工资以获得超额利润.

sentences.en: The number of corporate bankruptcies climbed in August.
sentences.cn: 8月份企业破产数字攀升。

sentences.en: The university is a corporate body made up of several different colleges.
sentences.cn: 例句：这所大学是一个由几所不同的学院组成的法人团体。

sentences.en: The yacht can be hired for corporate hospitality (= entertainment provided by companies for their customers ) .
sentences.cn: 可以租下这艘游艇用于公司招待客户。

sentences.en: They no longer expect corporate profits to improve.
sentences.cn: 他们不再期待公司利润会增长。

sentences.en: This established a strong corporate image.
sentences.cn: 这树立起了一种强有力的公司形象。

sentences.en: This is our corporate responsibility.
sentences.cn: 这是我们共同的责任。

sentences.en: Vince is vice-president of corporate communications.
sentences.cn: 文斯是负责企业宣传的副总裁。

sentences.en: Yet the corporate business organization has drawbacks as well as benefits.
sentences.cn: 公司这一营业组织形式既有优越性,也有不利之处.

words.tran_cn: 公司；法人（团体）；社团；大腹便便；市政当局
[法]法人的；共同的，全体的；社团的

phrases.tran_cn: 企业公民；公司公民；公司公民意识（原形是corporate citizen）
公司通讯；公司信息交流
公司金融；公司理财；公司融资
公司治理；企业管治，企业治理；公司管治
公司管理部门；公司主管人员

trans.tran_en: belonging to or relating to a corporation
